content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-3.5, -0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (-3.5, -0.5)), boiler(position (-6.5, 0.0)) and offshore pump (position (-9.5, -0.5))

### Iron ore mine at position(15.5, 70.5)
Consists of electric mining drill(position (15.5, 70.5)) and a chest at position(15.5, 72.5)

### Copper ore mine at position(-45.5, 70.5)
Consists of electric mining drill(position (-45.5, 70.5)) and a chest at position(-45.5, 72.5)

### Iron smelter at position(16.0, 75.0)
Consists of stone furnace(position (16.0, 75.0)) and an inserter at position(14.5, 75.5)

### Copper smelter at position(-45.0, 75.0)
Consists of stone furnace(position (-45.0, 75.0)) and an inserter at position(-46.5, 75.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities at occupied positions
- Ensure the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity.
- Consider increasing the spacing or changing the direction when placing entities next to existing ones.

### Errors when connecting entities directly
- Transport belts cannot be connected directly from a chest object as a source. Add an inserter that takes items from the chest and use the inserter as a source entity.

### Errors due to lack of fuel or ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces and inserter have sufficient fuel.
- Ensure that furnaces have the required ingredients to smelt.

### NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent in the given logs. Hence, this section is not included.
